headline: ALLE Q1 Earnings Call: Margin Expansion and Pricing Actions Amid Tariff Volatility
summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 5.4% year on year to $941.9 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.86 per share was 11.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
